00029 from Koo.Common import Common
00030 from Koo.Common import Icons
00031 from Koo.Common.Settings import *
00032 from Koo import Rpc
00033 
00034 from FormView import FormView, FormContainer
00035 from Koo.View.AbstractParser import *
00036 from Koo.Fields.FieldWidgetFactory import *
00037 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldWidget import *
00038 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00039 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00040 
00041 
00042 class FormParser(AbstractParser):
00043 
00044         def create(self, viewId, parent, viewModel, node, fields, filter=None):
00045                 self.viewModel = viewModel
00046                 self.filter = filter
00047                 self.widgetList = []
00048                 self.context = parent.context
00049                 # Create the view
00050                 self.view = FormView( parent )
00051                 self.view.id = viewId
00052                 # Parse and fill in the view
00053                 container, onWriteFunction = self.parse( node, fields )
00054                 self.view.setWidget( container )
00055                 self.view.setOnWriteFunction( onWriteFunction )
00056                 return self.view
00057 
00058         def parse(self, root_node, fields, notebook=None, container=None):
00059                 attrs = Common.nodeAttributes(root_node)
00060                 onWriteFunction = attrs.get('on_write', '')
00061 
00062                 if container == None :
00063                         parent = self.view
00064                         if notebook:
00065                                 parent = notebook
00066                         # We want FormContainer parent to be the notebook for the case
00067                         # when it's a QTabWidget. This way FormContainer can enable/disable
00068                         # the tab when necessary.
00069                         container = FormContainer( parent, int(attrs.get('col',4)) )
00070                 
00071                 if not self.view.title:
00072                         self.view.title = attrs.get('string', 'Unknown')
00073 
00074                 for node in root_node.childNodes:
00075                         if not node.nodeType==node.ELEMENT_NODE:
00076                                 continue
00077                         attrs = Common.nodeAttributes(node)
00078                         if node.localName=='image':
00079                                 icon = QLabel(container)
00080                                 icon.setPixmap( Icons.kdePixmap(attrs['name']) ) 
00081                                 container.addWidget(icon, attrs)
00082 
00083                         elif node.localName=='separator':
00084                                 caption = attrs.get( 'string', '' )
00085 
00086                                 separator = QWidget( container )
00087                                 separator.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Expanding, QSizePolicy.Fixed )
00088                                 label = QLabel( separator )
00089                                 label.setText( caption )
00090                                 font = label.font()
00091                                 font.setBold( True )
00092                                 label.setFont( font )
00093                                 line = QFrame( separator )
00094                                 line.setFrameShape( QFrame.HLine )
00095                                 line.setFrameShadow( QFrame.Plain )
00096                                 layout = QVBoxLayout( separator )
00097                                 layout.setAlignment( Qt.AlignTop )
00098                                 layout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00099                                 layout.setSpacing( 0 )
00100                                 layout.addWidget( label )
00101                                 layout.addWidget( line )
00102 
00103                                 self.view.addStateWidget( separator, attrs.get('attrs'), attrs.get('states') )
00104                                 container.addWidget( separator, attrs )
00105 
00106                         elif node.localName=='label':
00107                                 text = attrs.get('string', '')
00108                                 if not text:
00109                                         for node in node.childNodes:
00110                                                 if node.nodeType == node.TEXT_NODE:
00111                                                         text += node.data
00112                                                 else:
00113                                                         text += node.toxml()
00114                                 label = QLabel( text, container )
00115                                 label.setWordWrap( True )
00116                                 label.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Expanding, QSizePolicy.Fixed )
00117                                 container.addWidget(label, attrs)
00118 
00119                         elif node.localName=='newline':
00120                                 container.newRow()
00121 
00122                         elif node.localName=='button':
00123                                 button = FieldWidgetFactory.create( 'button', container, self.view, attrs )
00124                                 if not self.isWidgetVisible( attrs ):
00125                                         continue
00126                                 name = attrs.get('name', 'unnamed')
00127                                 self.view.widgets[name] = button
00128                                 self.view.addStateWidget( button, attrs.get('attrs'), attrs.get('states') )
00129                                 container.addWidget(button, attrs)
00130 
00131                         elif node.localName=='notebook':
00132                                 if not self.isWidgetVisible( attrs ):
00133                                         continue
00134                                 tab = QTabWidget( container )
00135                                 if attrs and 'tabpos' in attrs:
00136                                         pos = { 
00137                                                 'up': QTabWidget.North,
00138                                                 'down':QTabWidget.South,
00139                                                 'left':QTabWidget.West,
00140                                                 'right':QTabWidget.East
00141                                         } [attrs['tabpos']]
00142                                 else:
00143                                         pos = {
00144                                                 'left': QTabWidget.West,
00145                                                 'top': QTabWidget.North,
00146                                                 'right': QTabWidget.East,
00147                                                 'bottom': QTabWidget.South
00148                                         } [Settings.value('tabs_position')]
00149                                         
00150                                 tab.setTabPosition( pos )
00151 
00152                                 attrs['colspan'] = attrs.get('colspan', 3)
00153                                 
00154                                 container.addWidget(tab, attrs)
00155                                 
00156                                 # We pass a container because othewise a new container would 
00157                                 # be created by parse() and we don't want that because the tab
00158                                 # itself doesn't have a container: it's each of it's pages
00159                                 # that will have a container.
00160                                 _ , onWriteFunction = self.parse(node, fields, tab, container)
00161 
00162                         elif node.localName=='page':
00163                                 if not self.isWidgetVisible( attrs ):
00164                                         continue
00165                                 widget, onWriteFunction = self.parse(node, fields, notebook )
00166                                 # Mark the container as the main widget in a Tab. This way
00167                                 # we can enable/disable the whole tab easily.
00168                                 widget.isTab = True
00169                                 self.view.addStateWidget( widget, attrs.get('attrs'), attrs.get('states') )
00170 
00171                                 notebook.addTab( widget, Common.normalizeLabel( attrs.get('string', '') ) )
00172 
00173                         elif node.localName =='hpaned':
00174                                 widget = QSplitter( Qt.Horizontal, container )
00175 
00176                                 container.addWidget(widget, attrs)
00177                                 self.parse( node, fields, widget, container)
00178 
00179                         elif node.localName =='vpaned':
00180                                 widget = QSplitter( Qt.Vertical, container )
00181 
00182                                 container.addWidget(widget, attrs)
00183                                 self.parse( node, fields, widget, container)
00184 
00185                         elif node.localName == 'child1':
00186                                 widget, onWriteFunction = self.parse( node, fields )
00187                                 notebook.addWidget( widget )
00188 
00189                         elif node.localName == 'child2':
00190                                 widget, onWriteFunction = self.parse( node, fields )
00191                                 notebook.addWidget( widget )
00192 
00193                         elif node.localName =='action':
00194                                 name = str(attrs['name'])
00195                                 widget = FieldWidgetFactory.create( 'action', container, self.view, attrs )
00196                                 attrs['colspan'] = attrs.get('colspan', 3)
00197                                 self.view.widgets[name] = widget 
00198                                 container.addWidget(widget, attrs)
00199 
00200                         elif node.localName=='field':
00201                                 if not self.isWidgetVisible( attrs ):
00202                                         continue
00203                                 name = attrs['name']
00204                                 del attrs['name']
00205                                 type = attrs.get('widget', fields[name]['type'])
00206                                 fields[name].update(attrs)
00207                                 fields[name]['model'] = self.viewModel
00208 
00209                                 # Create the appropiate widget for the given field type
00210                                 widget = FieldWidgetFactory.create( type, container, self.view, fields[name] )
00211                                 if not widget:
00212                                         continue
00213 
00214                                 fields[name]['name'] = name
00215                                 if self.filter:
00216                                         widget.node = node
00217                                         self.widgetList.append(widget)
00218 
00219 
00220                                 label = None
00221                                 if not int(attrs.get('nolabel', 0)):
00222                                         label = fields[name]['string']+' :'
00223                                         
00224                                 self.view.widgets[name] = widget
00225                                 #attrs['colspan'] = int(attrs.get('colspan', widgets_type[ type ][1]))
00226 
00227                                 if not 'help' in attrs:
00228                                         attrs['help'] = fields[name].get('help', False)
00229 
00230                                 container.addWidget(widget, attrs, label)
00231 
00232                         elif node.localName=='group':
00233                                 if not self.isWidgetVisible( attrs ):
00234                                         continue
00235                                 widget, onWriteFunction = self.parse( node, fields, notebook )
00236                                 if 'string' in attrs:
00237                                         group = QGroupBox( notebook )
00238                                         group.setTitle( attrs['string'] )
00239                                         layout = QHBoxLayout( group )
00240                                         layout.setAlignment( Qt.AlignTop )
00241                                         layout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00242                                         layout.setSpacing( 0 )
00243                                         layout.addWidget( widget )
00244                                         widget = group
00245                                 
00246                                 self.view.addStateWidget( widget, attrs.get('attrs'), attrs.get('states') )
00247                                 container.addWidget( widget, attrs )
00248 
00249                 return  container, onWriteFunction
00250 
00251         def isWidgetVisible(self, attributes):
00252                 value = attributes.get('invisible')
00253                 if not value:
00254                         return True
00255                 return not eval(value, {'context':self.context})
